note: The source defines AI models as "large-scale" when their training compute is confirmed to exceed 10²³ [floating-point operations](#dod:flop).
title: Cumulative number of large-scale AI systems by country
subtitle: Refers to the location of the primary organization with which the authors of large-scale AI systems are affiliated. Data for 2024 is incomplete and was last updated on 19 June 2024.
